text: Gordon Bayard McComb (February 21, 1917 – June 14, 2007) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Hammond Ciesar All-Americans in two games and averaged 1.5 points per game. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American army personnel of World War II Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Illinois Category:Chattanooga Mocs men's basketball players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Hammond Ciesar All-Americans players Category:Military personnel from Illinois Category:People from Harvey, Illinois
title: Gordon McComb
